premise_source_doc_sentence: Thornton had his first break when he co-wrote and starred in the 1992 thriller One False Move , and came to international attention after writing , directing , and starring in the independent drama film Sling Blade  (  1996  )  , for which he won an Academy Award for Best Adapted Screenplay and was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Actor .

claim: Billy Bob Thornton appeared in a film directed by Charlie Kaufman.
